H0.text: who has the best batting average in test cricket. Sachin Tendulkar

H1.text: who has the best batting average in test cricket. Sir Vivian Richards

H2.text: who has the best batting average in test cricket. Brian Lara

H3.text: who has the best batting average in test cricket. Don Bradman

A4.text: Bradman's Test batting average of 99.94 has become one of cricket's most famous, iconic statistics.

A5.text: No other player who has played more than 20 Test match innings has finished their career with a Test average of more than 62.
